summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 19581 entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 1st Avenue Northwest from North 60th Street to West 58th Street; Greenwood Avenue from North 57th Street to North 60th Street; West 58th Street from 1st Avenue Northwest to the angle point between 1st Avenue Northwest and 3rd Avenue Northwest; North 58th Street from Phinney Avenue to 1st Avenue Northwest; Palatine Avenue from North 58th Street to Ballard Place; North 57th Street from Phinney Avenue to Palatine Avenue; Ballard Place from Palatine Avenue to 1st Avenue Northwest; and North 59th Street to from Phinney Avenue to 1st Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and by construction concrete sidewalks thereon in accordance with majority petition being file \# , and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of Payment by Bonds, as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle" approved November 20th, 1908.
